name: The Paradixion: Laboratory
description:
In a remote, secluded location where no human foot has set foot, there is a laboratory conducting secret research.
What purpose and what kind of research is being conducted in this laboratory is unknown, but
it is clear that strange things are happening.
Help with the research being conducted in this laboratory and complete the research,
unraveling the mysterious events happening within.

[The Paradixion: Laboratory] is the second installment in the [The Paradixion] series,
created by a solo South Korean developer. It's a point-and-click adventure game with a mysterious atmosphere.

Experience a unique story and various puzzles in a world with a distinctive ambience.

Anyone can play the game with ease thanks to its simple controls, without the need for special controls.
